title: International Affairs

contents.note: Oxford Academic (full text also available for subscription or payment)

preceded-by.note: Journal of the Royal Institute of International Affairs

additional-notes: This journal was suspended between 1939 and 1944, with International Affairs Review Supplement taking its place during that time, and continuing its issue numbering (which this serial also continued when it resumed).

This is a British publication.  Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Nat Bender for copyright research on this title.
